DOC.brief_summary: The principal objective of this study is to investigate the effects of a novel food supplement (Limicol) on LDL-cholesterol levels in healthy subjects with moderate hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.criteria: About 18 to 55 years (inclusive) Subject has a stable weight for at least three months before the start of the study Subject able and willing to comply with the protocol and agreeing to give their consent in writing Subject affiliated with a social security scheme Subject willing to be included in the national register of volunteers who lend themselves to biomedical research
